EmailTemplate.name: Event - Update Special Invite - Netherlands.Email - Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Tosca Update Special - Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We would like to thank you again for your participation in the Tosca Update Special 2015.
We would appreciate if you could take 3 minutes of your time to complete our online survey on how we can improve and adapt our events for you next year.
Thank you for your time!
Best regards,
Your Tosca Update Special Team
